descriptions:
["DescriptionLuxuryProperty.com is delighted to present this Dahlia villa for sale in the Jasmine Leaf, Al Barari.
• Discrete solar panels (huge energy saving)
* 6 En-suite Bedrooms
• BUA: 12,713 Sq.ft
• Plot Size:10,904 Sq.ft
• 3 Car Garage
• Powder Room
• Landscaped Gardens
• Swimming Pool
• Huge Study Room with En-suite
• Covered and Rooftop Terraces
• Equipped Guest Suite with Walk-in Wardrobes
This Dahlia villa includes 6 en-suite bedrooms, a study with en-suite, separate family, living and dining areas, a family kitchen and service kitchen, a laundry room, one basement room with bathroom, self-contained maid's living quarters, a three-car garage, a powder room, landscaped gardens, a swimming pool, covered terraces and a rooftop terrace. This villa has been designed to create the perfect family living environment and is also located in the very popular Jasmine Leaf. 
The owner has invested heavy into discrete solar panels on the roof and is saving not only the environment but significant amounts on DEWA bills.
Walking into the large entrance hall, there is an abundance of light flowing through the grand hallway. An impressive welcome rug and stylish seating area help to ensure that the villa has a real feeling of warmth to it. The ground floor is expansive with separate formal living room and formal dining room as well as a family living and family dining room. The property also boasts a large study, a beautifully equipped guest suite with walk-in wardrobes and stunning en-suite bathroom, and a kitchen that even the most avid chef will long for.
This property is built to the highest quality and offered in perfect condition, suitable for the most discerning of owners."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxury Property is delighted to present this stunning two-bed apartment at The 8, situated on a signature location of the West Crescent of Palm Jumeirah, The 8 offers the finest mixed resort and residence beachfront living.
The 8 is cool, chic Miami style living, the design is sophisticated and clean with a contemporary touch. Lightweight architecture and spaciousness are carried throughout the design, from the exterior focus on wide-open balconies to the airy and sleek interior where space is adorned with modern finishes. As you walk in the apartment you have a guest bathroom and maids room either side. You then walk into an open plan kitchen and living space. The balcony is connected to the living room where you enjoy an infinity view of the Arabian Gulf and the beautiful sunset every evening.
The 8 great appeal is its resort-style facilities that residents will enjoy which include two 25 meter beachfront pools, signature open-air restaurant, beach bar, gym, coffee shop and all full access to the 5-star hotel facilities on the resort.
Its design is simple yet bold, the perfect blend of symmetry and sophistication. Its clean and curvaceous lines have influenced art, fashion, design, and architecture. A symbol of good fortune. A change in perspective and it becomes infinity. Count the floors of this modern beachfront development and you find 8 storeys ready to unfold.
This property would be perfect for a small family or a holiday home investor.']
